subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: When the 109th Open begins at Bethpage Black on Long Island, it will be the 22nd Open in the New York City area, compared to 13 in the Chicago suburbs and 10 in California.
snippet: When the 109th Open begins at Bethpage Black on Long Island, it will be the 22nd Open in the New York City area, compared to 13 in the Chicago suburbs and 10 in California.
